description: I joined Lamda Chi in the spring of 2013 and have loved every minute of it.  I enjoy doing near anything outdoors, hanging out with the guys, seeking our leadership opportunities, and giving back to Georgia Tech's Greek community.
aspects: I love the diversity Lamda Chi has to offer.  No matter what you're in to, there's always someone who is into the same thing.  We aren't a cookie cutter fraternity, which allows us to learn and grow together.
quotes: "A friend loves at all times, and a brother is born for adversity" - Proverbs 17:17
name: Jordan Cain
